website_summaries.verdict: Containing 12 place settings, this 18/0 set is an upgrade over cheap flatware from a department store.
pros: Pieces have a streamlined design that appeals to customers who like flatware with minimalist styling
Set includes a limited lifetime warranty
cons: Low-grade stainless steel (18/0) may be more prone to rusting and pitting

customer_reviews.title: Rust after 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this set for about months now. My previous set was Oneida and we've had them for 10+ years. Still have a few. However, in this set they are all rusty. The design is great. The hold feels amazing. But rust... I tried to contact before poor review with no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Rusting Silverware
customer_reviews.text: These are rusting!! I bought them 3 months ago. What a waste of money. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Miller

customer_reviews.title: IT RUSTS - SEE PHOTOS
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in June -- it is now October, and the photos show how the flatware looks -- heavily rusted. The Amazon listing says "Dishwasher safe, never needs polishing ." Obviously it is not. This set has been lightly used. Maybe washed in a Bosch dishwasher once per week. Because of the rust, it is now unusable. The window for returning expired 30 days after purchase, so the only option is to throw this set of flatware in the trash. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: dc-delmar

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!  Started rusting within the first week of dishwasher use!
customer_reviews.text: Got two sets of these for Christmas and they are already rusting after a few time I the dishwasher! I wish I would have read the reviews first!!! 😩
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle Bakken

customer_reviews.title: Great except they can stain.
customer_reviews.text: While the flatware is attractive and solid they really do cloud and stain a little. I have an excellent dishwasher detergent and I've previously used dozens of flatware styles (a variety from thrift stores) and none have clouded or stained like these. Also noteworthy is that Oneida discontinued this line quite a while ago (the person I spoke with at Oneida had never heard of Mooncrest). I wanted to order additional spoons but they don't come in Satin, only regular (more shiny) version.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: The quality is really good!
customer_reviews.text: I have put these to the test and have washed in the dishwasher several times now. No rust or issues to be seen. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SmithStine

customer_reviews.title: Great silverware set, don't hesitate to buy
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this silverware, great price too! These are nice and sturdy with a good heft without feeling blocky or unrefined. They feel good in the hand, the butter knives are quite sharp and they have an excellent finish. I'm super glad I ordered the 45 piece set as my fiance and I go through them like a hot knife through butter.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B.

customer_reviews.title: RUST after 1st wash
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking set. Did not feel too light being that it was super affordable I wasn't expecting much as far as weight went and that was a nice surprise. Unfortunately, the most important factor when buying any flatware is rust. After running through the dishwasher there was rust staining. Our dishwasher isn't the newest so I'm assuming the flatware was wet too long but I don't feel as though it should've happened before I even got to use them lol So if you have a good dishwasher that completely dries your dishes maybe take the risk but for everyone else it is a no.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: No Good
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of this flatware but I had to rate it low as I have had these for less than 3 months and everyone of the knives have rust spots that wont come off. Some of the other flatware does as well but especially the knives. I would be embarrassed to use these for company and frankly I don't know if it's even safe!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Matlack

customer_reviews.title: We've owned a set for years and bought one for our Daughter
customer_reviews.text: Other than one spoon that got caught in the disposal, these are all still going strong about 8 years later. We liked them so much, we bought our daughter a set for her housewarming. They are a good size and weight, with the exception of the knives whose handles are overly heavy. I would have preferred the handles be better proportioned on the knives. Tend to fall off plates. The materials and workmanship are fantastic for the price, though.
customer_reviews.author: L. Shuler

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy nicely polished even though the pics looked like a matte finish which I would prefer but I still like them. Tried to bend a spoon to simulate the "ice cream" test and the spoon held up incredibly well beyond my expectations. I also have extremely hard water and a water softener and no rust issues which is impressive, my water ate all my tub and shower drains so these holding up to my water is truly impressive. I would buy these again if I ever needed to in the future.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sines

customer_reviews.title: Rusting after 3 WEEKS!
customer_reviews.text: I have had other Oneida flatware in the past with no issues. We were moving, but needed to keep both houses livable for a short period of time, so I needed some flatware for the new house. I've washed them twice in the dishwasher (and multiple times by hand) in the 3 weeks we've had them. Several pieces are rusting. I am very disappointed in the lack of quality of these and am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: hbrittingham

customer_reviews.title: Rusted...Disappointing After Seeing The Nice Reviews
customer_reviews.text: I like Oneida alot an have used their stuff before but this was poor quality and out of the return time frame. I never let them sit in a water filled sink or in the dishwasher and i dry them before I put them away an one of the butter knifes and forks started to rust. Very dissapointed an do not think I will purchase Oneida going further
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this set over 14 years ago. We loved it then and love it even more now. Great durability and quality of the metal. So thankful we were able to find and purchase again. I actually just purchased another set so that we will have extras😃 Love this set and highly recommend it. Thank you Oneida!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ( What a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It rusts after being in dishwasher after a month of being purchased.Guess it's not waterproof. : ( What a waste of money!!!!!Don't buy this because it is useless. From a customer disappointed in The Oneida brand....it's not the best brand name anymore.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I tried several brands before reverting to Onieda no because I didn't consider it before; rather, I was trying more economical options. However, with certain things, one should spend a little more to get a better made and loner lasting product, cutlery is one of them. This is a very durable and well-made product. The only advise I have is that if for some reason one has difficulty to lift heavier cutlery, then this is going to heavier than less expensive brands in the market. Otherwise from a quality standpoint one can't go wrong with Onieda.
customer_reviews.author: MZM

customer_reviews.title: Super pretty!
customer_reviews.text: They are much shinier in person then in the photo, that is my only complaint. I worry they will tarnish and look bad over time. They are really mirrored and shiny new. They are weighty but not the heaviest silverware I have used. I was looking for something a tad heavier but I am not upset by the weight at all. They came in two packages to get 12 sets and I have a sneaking suspicion that the Mooncrest style went through a design change between boxes. Both boxes say Mooncrest but the ends look marginally different.
customer_reviews.author: G. Sha

customer_reviews.title: A good fit on my Table
customer_reviews.text: I replaced old flatware that I had for years with this set. I love the way it looks, feels in my hand, and that it's balanced well. I dislike any flatware that bends when one needs to use some pressure to scoop out something and that is one of the reasons I kept my old flatware as it was sturdy as an ox (is an ox sturdy?) This Oneida flatware fits in all ways. I definitely would purchase this item again if I would need to but am very pleased with the whole set. I received it the day before Thanksgiving and was delighted to use it for my table setting.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine H.

customer_reviews.title: My Mom Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these set of silverware as a gift for my Mom the months ago. I’m glad to say she was super happy with her gift. The silverware are super shiny from good material and have a good weight. In order it to keep them clean and shiny, she has to wipe then down every time she washes them with hot water before put them in the drawer. As of now, they look stunning. If you need to get one of these, you should do it. You’ll be very happy as my Mom and I are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this silverware set
customer_reviews.text: I love this silverware set. It is elegant, and heavy. Not cheaply made. It'll look great at any dinner we set the table from normal every day to Thanksgiving and Christmas. Love this set. I may buy another set just to have extra forks and spoons available. I had to replace my old set because it just started to look like its age (at least 10 years!) and was getting rust spots. Have I said I love this set?
customer_reviews.author: aconroy

customer_reviews.title: I like them. The picture makes them look like much ...
customer_reviews.text: I like them. The picture makes them look like much more of a brushed steel, but they’re actually bright shiny chrome. I am still happy with them regardless. They appear to be of high quality. Here’s hoping they stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Elliott

customer_reviews.title: They are absolutely solid and still look great. We are very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have had these for about 6 months now and use them everyday. They are absolutely solid and still look great. We are very happy with the purchase. As I said we use them daily yet they are still nice enough for more formal dinners. We always wash them in the dishwasher (no issues).
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Lucca

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Oneida silverware set. I decided to buy a larger set to use when having guests over. Since it is a set of 8, I just ordered a second set, 20 pieces only, so I can make a set of 12 servings. Glad that it offers smaller sets! Note that these feel good in the hand, and I washed them in the dish washer already. No issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: PNeiva

customer_reviews.title: Rusting after two weeks !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Oneida because of its durability. That doesn't seem to be the case anymore. Love the pattern and set but after two weeks it is rusting. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: swansonx6

customer_reviews.title: These are very sturdy, nice silverware
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy, nice silverware. The only downside I've noticed is the butter knives have been getting a little rust on them when put in this dishwasher. None of my other silverware seems affected so I've just been washing the knives by hand to prevent it
customer_reviews.author: Corey minich

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday. High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Simple design and easy to hold! Perfect for casual meals at the beach house. I donated the ikea cutlery-
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Not a fancy or ornate set of flatware, but wonderful. Well made, and great for everyday use. Survived multiple times through the dishwasher, and came out looking great.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, strong set of silverware.
customer_reviews.text: This Oneida flatware set is excellent for the money. Often as buyers/consumers we can purchase flatware in stores but this one is far far superior to those due to its sturdiness, weight, and overall ease of use. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L.R.M.

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied I would like a replacement and then be able to send these back.
customer_reviews.text: The knives are already starting to rust. Supposed to be dishwasher safe. Very disappointed.we didn’t start using this silverware until Christmas as it was a present. She has gotten given away her old silver ware and it is pretty bad that this is already rusting. WHAT ARE YOU GOING TO DO To FIX THE PROBLEM??
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hoopes

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good value and perfectly fine for any table. The large forks are a bit too large for my taste, but perhaps that's the style at this time. First set of stainless steel I've purchased since 1975! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Silverware arrived well packaged, as advertised, have an excellent feel to the hand (medium size hands), have nice balance, nice weight (not too heavy and definitely not too light. Been using my old silverware for over 10 yrs...and didn't even notice the change to the Oneida Mooncrest model (meaning they are so nice in your hand that you don't even notice the silverware when using them).
customer_reviews.author: MWC

customer_reviews.title: Shiny not dull finish
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and nice. They have a mirrored finish and not a brushed finish as in the picture. I did not want mirrored/shiny! I'm too cheap to mail back something so heavy, so I am keeping them
customer_reviews.author: DiMa J

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful silver ware set
customer_reviews.text: These are a really nice set of silver ware! They are heavy and comfortable in your hands. I like that this set serves 8 people because I was always searching for more with my last set. They have a very nice shiny finish on them. The only downside to these style finishes is that you have to wash and dry them right away or they have a cloudy residue on them. Over fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Conner Wiesman

customer_reviews.title: They run through the dishwasher just fine and I haven't had any trouble with them
customer_reviews.text: I got these to fill in and replace pieces that were missing in an old set. These are my everyday flatware and matches my old ones close enough you really can't tell the difference. They run through the dishwasher just fine and I haven't had any trouble with them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Heavy weight; Full shape to handle (not sunken on back or hollowed out); Good proportion between handle and the head of each piece. Simple, clean lines, high quality silverware. Exactly what I was looking for, and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: aredjeep

customer_reviews.title: Lets eat
customer_reviews.text: My daughter hosts family dinners and always needs flatware. I used this pattern to supplement my own. No one wants to polish the sterling or the plate. These pieces have heft and are good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight to them, balances well in hand.
customer_reviews.text: These pieces are very very heavy and that's exactly what I was looking for. Silverware like you used to get at Grandma's house not cheap stuff that is unbalanced in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa James

customer_reviews.title: Overall Great
customer_reviews.text: Very shiny and nice. One spoon out of 12 pieces had ruff spot I sanded with soft side emery board. It worked. Love weight and the knifes cut through steaks well.
customer_reviews.author: Swanlake

customer_reviews.title: As with most I like these a lot
customer_reviews.text: As with most I like these a lot! Nice heavy feel and the 18/0 stainless steel is in fact durable and stylish... four + years of daily use.. BUT the tapered handle is not the easiest to hold. Many patterns flair out at the bottom to make them easier to handle but these are just the opposite. So if purchasing for someone with less than nimble hands I would not recommend this pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Denver Dave

customer_reviews.title: Best forks ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! I've had these for about 5 years and they are fantastic. Unfortunately, some of my pieces have gone missing so I was thrilled to find them again. They are made well and can handle a lot of wear and tear with no damage. The fork prongs still look great after years of use. I love that I also have a nice serving set with my silverware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean, Minimal Aesthetic
customer_reviews.text: Strong, smooth lines and a beautiful, minimal aesthetic work really well in this set of flatware. We've been very pleased and love the look on our dark wood table with white plates and clear glasses. Sometimes we wonder if the knives could cut better, but overall we are happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Young

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is quality dinnerware. I didn't want to spend a lot but I wanted quality. Vey happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Slugger

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking, High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Very well made. My wife and I both like the feel. You don’t have to worry about this bending!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Beware of rust
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible quality. They started rusting after the very first wash. We have a larger family and dishes get washed every night, so they aren’t being left in water for long periods. Very dissatisfied with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Oneida - count on quality!
customer_reviews.text: This pattern goes from casual to formal dining and always looks great! It is my 2nd set as I have two homes. You can't go wrong with Oneida. Consistently, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: whip o'will

customer_reviews.title: Best quality for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought these. Great price, high quality product. They feel really good and balanced. Nice and sharp points too.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent thick quality!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these. I love how thick and sturdy they are! Most silverware is thin metal and will bend or sometimes break if you apply too much pressure. These are some very thick silverware/flatware. Highly recommend! I wish they didn’t show every water mark, only downfall but honestly if I wanted something fancy it would only be for certain occasions and these are fabulous for every day wear!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this flatware!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, simple, effective. Easy to use, easy to clean. Shiny!
customer_reviews.author: Superheroperson

customer_reviews.title: They looked and felt great, but the high shine meant fingerprints everywhere
customer_reviews.text: They looked and felt great, but the high shine meant fingerprints everywhere. I washed and dried them by hand, and set the table. So frustrating the fingerprints--made the utensils look dirty. I unset the table, and returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: THEY RUST
customer_reviews.text: Bought these June 19, 2019 and they started rusting in August 2019. These things were not cheap, very disappointed. I'm even more disappointed that I'm not able to return these, my fault for not paying attention to make sure they had a window of time to return them. I assumed being they were backed by Amazon, they would be returnable....Guess I was wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flatware!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a while now. They hold up well and keep their integrity. The knives, however, have had the occasional small rust spot. They do scrub off pretty easily. I don't use any "citrus flavored" detergents which are known to cause this issue. Overall I really like this set and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tferrant

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for months now and do use a dishwasher. I expect I'll have to replace them in a year or so due to scratching becoming visible. Overall I am satisfied with them for the price
customer_reviews.author: Leah Kienke

customer_reviews.title: This Flatware won’t bend on you. Very strong
customer_reviews.text: Very good sturdy flatware! A good simple plain pattern. This guage of metal is what you want. It won’t bend and is not flimsy. I bought a set for myself. My mom liked them so much we got her a set. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: So happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations in every way. Simple, solid without being heavy, beautiful, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large size
customer_reviews.text: Nice material with sturdy feel. Only reason gave this product 4 stars is because the mouth part of the forks and spoons are very large to the point that using the salad fork and dessert spoon is easier than the larger a ones.
customer_reviews.author: ammnic

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Set of Flatware
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set for the price. The simplicity makes the flatware look even better than in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonlorde

customer_reviews.title: you are fine. The knives have the most dramatic differences in ...
customer_reviews.text: When placed side-by-side with the Oneida Mooncrest flatware from around 10 years ago, there are some definite variations, but they are close enough of a match to be acceptable. As long as you don't have multiples of the same piece in the same place setting, you are fine. The knives have the most dramatic differences in shape and serration. The quality seems fine and should last well like the older pieces I have used daily for a decade.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have given several of these sets as gifts to men and women. They have complemented it after using at my house.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Nice shape
customer_reviews.text: Needed silver with more rounded handles and tips and this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: tracie pruitt

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong with this brand!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these so much as a Christmas gift, I bought a second set!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordering another set
customer_reviews.text: I looked a long time before making this purchase. I bought the 8 setting box. They are a nice weight, clean up very nicely and go with both my everyday and "fancy" dinnerware. I like them so much I just ordered another set so I'll have enough for the big family dinners.
customer_reviews.author: MoRee

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I hand wash and try to keep them from soaking . so far so good no rust .had them about 2or 3 months
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Perrea

customer_reviews.title: Best set I’ve owned
customer_reviews.text: I needed to add to my older set of the same brand and pattern. It was nice to find!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Bullock

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this set of silverware
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this set of silverware. I want to be buried with it! I know, a little over kill but it's still that awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Aylesworth

customer_reviews.title: Appropriate for value priced shoppers
customer_reviews.text: The quality and durability is average for sets in this price range. The appearance is clean and simple. The soft metal surface does scratch easily. If you have any hard water issues, the smooth surface may show water spots. If you use any sort of abrasive cleaning, such as a scratch pad, the surface WILL scratch. Hand drying may be necessary. The knife handles are somewhat heavier than average. The set is heavy enough to prevent bending. If you are looking for a set in this price range, and avoid the scratching issues mentioned, you'll likely find they are satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: John S  Test-Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: A perfect weight and very sturdy. A high polish. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry H.

customer_reviews.title: RUST and WATER SPOTS
customer_reviews.text: After 3 weeks my utensils have rust spots and water spots. Any warranties?
customer_reviews.author: Joe G

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned this set for a year and it still looks brand new. It is heavy and stands up to daily dishwasher abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of flatware, goes well with just about anything,
customer_reviews.text: Clean simple lines, very shiny. Pretty much read the description. They are comfortable to hold and use. Solid all around, not hollow on the back like a lot of flatware (like the set I got from the store with the red dot a couple years ago). Stamped with the Oneida name on each piece in case you forget. Ha!
customer_reviews.author: someguy

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I was wary of buying flatware online - you can't really get a "feel" for it. However, I was really impressed with this set. It's heavyweight and each piece is perfectly sized, and looks like a million bucks. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: These feel strudy, but they are rusting a bit.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for short term rental. They are solid, sturdy and functional, and I like the look and style. However, after a few months, they are rusting a bit and residue is left if not hand dried.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Blackner

customer_reviews.title: I love my flatware!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new flatware. I have looked for reasonable priced flatware in stores and they are usually not sturdy. I was pleasantly surprised by these.
customer_reviews.author: legg

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this flatware. Has held up well and feel comfortable in hand!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Adams

customer_reviews.title: Nothing negative!!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but kudos on flatware set. Weigh just right. Design simple, just as I wanted. Well worth price. So disappointed in some online orders, not this one. Love, may get another to use when entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn harry

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: The flatware seems to be of good quality. I’m very happy with the weight. All the pieces were included including the serving pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Doner

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Love this silverware set. It is very simple and great quality. It’s heavy without being too heavy. I looked at a ton of silverware sets before deciding on this one and have not been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Thornburg

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to clean and use
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I just received these silverware and we had decided we wanted stainless steel. It is easy to clean either by hand or by dishwasher, they are much heavier than we thought but that is a good thing. They are solid and super easy to use and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good weight and feel.
customer_reviews.text: Nice feeling flatware. It is used in our home and airbnb rentals.
customer_reviews.author: mountainmom

customer_reviews.text: love 'em! very simple design with no grove to have to try and get food out of. handles are nice and sturdy, they are not going to bend when trying to get ice cream out of the container.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette G.

customer_reviews.title: Most of these have started to rust, with tiny ...
customer_reviews.text: Most of these have started to rust, with tiny rust spots. I would have expected it from a cheaper set of utensils, but these were not that cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great silverware set!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set for me so far. I haven't used in dishwasher yet; so I'm hoping my thoughts won't change - BUT, it is a nice heavy set and all pieces were the perfect size I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Oltmanns

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I thought by sticking with a known brand I would be satisfied. WRONG. The fork times look like I could bend them individually with one finger. So light weight, very cheap look. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L Kasch

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with Oneida tableware. This is great quality, I have put in my dishwasher and there has been no pitting or rusting. It's a good weight too does not feel cheap at all. I got these to add to my current set. Glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: yogi

customer_reviews.title: Nice lines, super versatile, recipients like it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift -- the recipients are happy, and said it came in handy for extended-family dinners this summer.
customer_reviews.author: YBAVRG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful flatware. My first "real" set of silverware that ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful flatware. My first "real" set of silverware that didn't come with plastic handles (haha). They shine up very nicely and their smooth surface makes washing quick and easy. They're fairly heavy, so they feel like quality.
customer_reviews.author: RaCat

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: they're 1 piece so they won't fall apart after time.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Very mad
customer_reviews.text: Well I thought everything was fine until I emptied the dishwasher today. Forks are starting to rust! Not happy at all! Don't purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Antonette Stiebritz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality utensils, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than anticipated. I'm very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald G. Frei

customer_reviews.title: great product and stands up to a family of 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid heavy construction, great product and stands up to a family of 5 and the dishwasher every night.
customer_reviews.author: Always Growing

customer_reviews.title: Would Purchase Again... which I did
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to match the set that I already had, but lost several pieces during a move. They are sturdy and the price is reasonable. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Thriftshop331

customer_reviews.title: Mirror Shine wasn't for me.
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, Oneida makes excellent flatware. I have had 3 sets in my life, and I have loved them all. Heavyweight, strong, ergonomic, beautiful. I returned this particular set because they were mirror-shiny. I was looking for a brushed, matte look. Otherwise they are great!
customer_reviews.author: RMB

customer_reviews.title: It felt nice replacing 15 year old flatware.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this set, from seeing pictures here on amazon. Took the chance and got them. Was surprised at the weight and I really like the rounded ends.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Nice silverware, but slightly damaged
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and weight of the silverware, but I was quite disappointed to see that 10 of the 65 pieces arrived with some sort of scratch, dent, or pitting. That's is a large percentage with issues, and this is a set from China. Everything is usable, but has lost some cosmetic appeal right out of the box. It makes me wonder if it will hold up for more than a few years.
customer_reviews.author: K. Evans

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: I had no problem with the shipping or the seller. Both were a great experience! I also LOVE this product! I had read through the other reviews before purchasing, and many spoke of the nice weight of each utensil is in your hand. I have to agree with them; the product feels great while holding it. The smooth design and shape of the handle have a lot to do with this as well. I have noticed that the spoons have gotten a little scratched, but it's nothing bad. I would HIGHLY recommended this product and seller to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Wilfong

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but rusts quickly
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of this silverwear, it feels expensive and strong. But... after one wash it started to rust and it won’t come off. Pretty upset about the rust, but for the price I will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea M.

customer_reviews.title: And I love this silverware
customer_reviews.text: I am needing 4 more salad forks from this set. How can I order just that? Please help! And I love this silverware!!Durable, and classy.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie bailey

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much I bought more bc there were only 4 pieces in each set
customer_reviews.author: L M R

customer_reviews.title: Love these. I have had them for a few ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I have had them for a few months now and they were just what I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love them. They are very shiny and heavy
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They are very shiny and heavy. Just what I was looking for. However, one of the utensils came with a stain built into it but I can live with it. Another thing is that once you wash them you have to wipe them or you will have water spots. Other than that I think they are great and would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: pauline lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Nice and plain
customer_reviews.text: I sent it to someone as a gift because they like plain things.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

product_meta.title: Oneida B336045A Mooncrest 45-Piece Flatware Set, Service for 8,Silver,45 Piece
product_meta.description:
Size:45 PieceOneida's Mooncrest pattern is understated and pairs with virtually any china and decor. Boasting a bright, highly reflective finish, this 45-piece set offers service for eight. Each place setting includes a salad/dessert fork, place fork, place knife, place spoon, and teaspoon. The set also includes a serving spoon, pierced serving spoon, meat fork, butter knife, and sugar spoon. Made of 18/0 stainless steel, the pieces are dishwasher safe. The set comes backed by Oneida's 25-year warranty. 

 What's in the Box? Eight each: salad/dessert fork, place fork, place knife, place spoon, and teaspoon. 1 each: serving spoon, pierced serving spoon, meat fork, butter knife, and sugar spoon. 



AMAZON.COM
Frame an everyday dinnerware pattern or complement a dressy special-occasion table with the clean, gently rounded lines of Oneida's Mooncrest flatware. Made of quality 18/0 stainless steel with a lustrous mirror polish, this durable yet elegant design features slightly elongated working ends balanced by slender flared handles with softly pointed tips. The curved edges make for a comfortable fit in the hand, and the relatively flat profiles create a low-key, sophisticated look. Affordable as well as enduringly stylish, Mooncrest offers an easy way to smarten up dining experiences for years to come.

 This 45-piece set offers service for eight, and each place setting includes a salad/dessert fork, place fork, place knife, place spoon, and teaspoon. The set also includes a serving spoon, pierced serving spoon, meat fork, butter knife, and sugar spoon for a well-coordinated table. Mooncrest is dishwasher-safe and comes with Oneida's 25-year warranty. --Kara Karll
feature_bullets: 45-piece flatware set with service for 8. Set includes 8 each: Dinner knife, Dinner Fork, Salad/Dessert Fork, Soup/Cereal Spoon and Teaspoon plus 2 Serving Spoons, 1 Serving Fork, 1 Sugar Spoon, and 1 Butter Knife

Mooncrest is unadorned, sleek and simple. The ideal flatware choice for the purist at heart. This popular design boasts a bright, highly reflective finish. A pattern well suited for contemporary tableware
Limited lifetime warranty. Each piece of fine quality Oneida stainless is warranted against defects in workmanship and materials for the lifetime of the original owner.
